## [MatrixAutoRegressions.jl](https://github.com/ivanuricardo/MatrixAutoRegressions.jl)
A lightweight Julia package for Matrix Autoregressive (MAR) models.

## [GraphicalLasso.jl](https://github.com/ivanuricardo/GraphicalLasso.jl)

This package provides efficient tools for generating sparse covariance matrices, estimating sparse precision matrices using the graphical lasso (glasso) algorithm (Friedman, Hastie, and Tibshirani 2008; Meinshausen and BÃ¼hlmann 2006), and selecting optimal regularization parameters.

## [Rank Determination in Matrix Error Correction Models](https://github.com/ivanuricardo/MECMrankdetermination)

Replication materials for "Detecting Cointegrating Relations in Non-Stationary Matrix-Valued Time Series".
